title: Kavaghhelltothefuckingnaw
description:
Spent your day listening to the Kavanaugh hearings?  We did too.  And we wanted to offer up some real time insights and perspectives on what was a dramatic and historic day.  We do this in the form of one of our new series of "Briefs and Debriefs", this one with one of our legal experts, Katie Phang, an experienced lawyer and former prosecutor.  She frames the discussion and pulls no punches.  And she does it all in under 20 minutes.  Please tune in!Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/deepstateradio.

content:encoded:
Spent your day listening to the Kavanaugh hearings? We did too. And we wanted to offer up some real time insights and perspectives on what was a dramatic and historic day. We do this in the form of one of our new series of "Briefs and Debriefs", this one with one of our legal experts, Katie Phang, an experienced lawyer and former prosecutor. She frames the discussion and pulls no punches. And she does it all in under 20 minutes. Please tune in!

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/deepstateradio.
